title: Oregon National Historic Trail: Minor Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Exhibits     Minor Park                Minor Park       The Santa Fe, Oregon, and California national historic trails (NHTs) passed through Minor Park in the Kansas City, Missouri area. The Oregon and California trails provided pathways to the Pacific for fur traders, gold seekers, missionaries, and emigrants. The Santa Fe Trail was an international road for American and Mexican traders. Check it out!  Â       Trail Hazards The deep ruts left by Santa Fe Trail wagons in the mid-1800s are still clearly visible at Minor Park. Why? This outdoor exhibit will give you some clues! (975 KB pdf)
